sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-responsive class="mx-auto" max-width="350">
          <v-form @submit.prevent>
            <v-text-field
              hide-details="auto"
              label="Username"
              placeholder="loremIpsum"
              prepend-icon="mdi-account"
              variant="underlined"
              clearable="true"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-form>
        </v-responsive>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "RegisterView",
  data() {
    return {
      requestLoading: false,
      username: null,
      password: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    register() {
      this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
      axios
        .post("http://192.168.1.110:8000/users/register/", {
          username: this.username,
          password: this.password,
        })
        .then((response) => {
          if (response.status == 201) {
            this.requestLoading = !this.requestLoading;
          }
        });
    },
  },
};
</script>
